channel.title: Hi, I'm Jon Behr from accountsportal.com
channel.description:
Hi All,
I'm the owner and founder of http://www.accountsportal.com. We're a SaaS business that has been going for about 4 years. We provide accounting and invoicing software to small businesses, freelancers, consultants, contractors, etc
We're 100% bootstrapped (and proud of it!).
We also provide consulting and development services (mostly Laravel), and this has (a bit surprisingly) mushroomed over the past few months.
We're in the process of building a new SaaS app (for ourselves), and on the lookout for a Laravel dev (preferably on location in London, UK). If you are interested in getting involved in a brand new product from the start and you've got some Laravel + MySQL skills, then please get in touch! No formal work experience is necessary.

item.title: Hi, I'm Jon Behr from accountsportal.com
item.dc:creator: steve228uk
item.description:
Oh nice! We use FreeAgent at the moment. Looks like you guys offer a very similar service for a fraction of the cost.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Jon Behr from accountsportal.com
